item.title: Xinpeng Wei
item.description: self-introduction Currently studying at Shanghai Jiao Tong University SEIEE software engineering More about my acadimic profile Fan of movies —— Interested in nearly all kinds of movies More about my film interests Cloud Fan of NBA —— Due to the studying pressure, I don’t have time to watch live NBA games and I could only use Hupu as an alternative. What’s more, I don’t have a favorite team or player so I call me a cloud fan of NBA
